name: Lina: Witches Of The Moon
description:
Still work in progress

Story:

Lina, among many others, is an avarage witch living in the forest. But one night everything changes as those who were once friends turned into enemies.

Fight through the horde of summons, beat hypnotized witches and figure out who is behind all this.

Desc:

Lina: Witches Of The Moon is an entry for Krystman's Basic Shmup Showcase event, which revolves around the amazing shmup tutorial series for the fantasy console: PICO-8.

Controls:

Arrows, WASD or a controller to move.

C, or PS X to shoot

X, or PS O to fire a huge and powerful wave, if you have cat bombs.

Gameplay:

Powerups will help you along your journey!

Health Potions, Shields, Single-, Double-, Triple Shot, where singles boast the highest damage but triples help you against the most enemies. The all powerfull Cat Bomb and the Magical Star to protect you for some time!

Sour Cream will help you fight, if you pickup a potion while on full health. Be carefull he doesn't like to be in danger! If you get hit he will return to safety.
